description: This course will build on Dental Practice I and II and provide experience in clinical general practice dentistry in the simulated and clinical environments. This course focuses on provision of clinical care to adult & adolescent patients. Students will attain competence in examination, diagnosis, preventive oral health care, intra-coronal restorative dentistry & pain management. Each week, students will have 3hr of pre-clinical laboratories, 6hr of clinical work and 3hr of observation/assisting in a 4th or 5th year student clinic.
